contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Nijefurd | official_name = Nijefurd | native_name = | image_flag = Nijefurd flag.svg | flag_size = 120x100px | flag_alt = Flag of Nijefurd | image_seal = | seal_size = | seal_alt = | image_shield = Nijefurd seal.svg | shield_size = 120x100px | shield_alt = Coat of arms of Nijefurd |image_map = LocatieNijefurd.png |mapsize = 250px |latd=52|latm=59|lats=|latNS=N |longd=5|longm=26|longs=|longEW=E |coordinates_display = inline,title |coordinates_region = NL |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = [[Netherlands]] |subdivision_type1 = Province |subdivision_name1 = [[Friesland]] |subdivision_type2 = Municipality |subdivision_name2 = [[Súdwest-Fryslân]] |area_footnotes = (2006) |area_total_km2 = 289.17 |area_land_km2 = 96.68 |area_water_km2 = 192.49 |population_as_of = 1 January, 2007 |population_note = Source: [[Statistics Netherlands|CBS]], [http://statline.cbs.nl/ Statline]. |settlement_type = Former municipality |population_total = 10887 |population_density_km2 = 113 |timezone = [[Central European Time|CET]] |utc_offset = +1 |timezone_DST = [[Central European Summer Time|CEST]] |utc_offset_DST = +2 }} '''Nijefurd''' ({{Pronunciation|458 Nijefurd.ogg}}) is a former municipality in the northern [[Netherlands]], in the province of [[Friesland]]. ==History== It was formed in 1984 from the old municipalities of Hindeloopen, Stavoren, and Workum, and part of Hemelumer Oldeferd. In 2011 it formed together with the municipalities of [[Bolsward]], [[Sneek]], [[Wûnseradiel]] and [[Wymbritseradiel]] the new municipality [[Súdwest Fryslân]]. == Population centres == [[Hemelum]], [[Hindeloopen]], [[It Heidenskip]], [[Koudum]], [[Molkwerum]], [[Nijhuizum]], [[Stavoren]], [[Warns, Friesland|Warns]] and [[Workum]]. == External links == {{commonscat-inline|Nijefurd}} *[http://www.nijefurd.nl Official Website] {{Dutch municipality Súdwest-Fryslân}} [[Category:Former municipalities of Friesland]] [[Category:Súdwest-Fryslân]] {{Friesland-geo-stub}}
